member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_MBR
member.summary: Contains partition information specific to master boot record (MBR) disks.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_MBR.PartitionType
member.summary: The type of partition. For a list of values, seeDisk Partition Types.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_MBR.BootIndicator
member.summary: If the member is TRUE, the partition is a boot partition. When this structure is used with theIOCTL_DISK_SET_PARTITION_INFO_EX control code, the value of this parameter is ignored.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_MBR.RecognizedPartition
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the partition is of a recognized type. When this structure is used with theIOCTL_DISK_SET_PARTITION_INFO_EX control code, the value of this parameter is ignored.

member.name: PARTITION_INFORMATION_MBR.HiddenSectors
member.summary: The number of hidden sectors to be allocated when the partition table is created.
